title: These new AMD 7000 Series processors are a content creator’s best friend
description: AMD 7000 Series processors could be great for content creators.

title: Linux 6.0 should be with us very soon
description: After doubt over rc6, the success of Linux 6.0 rc7 means we should have the next OS by early October 2022.

title: Amazon Echo Show 8 finally gets Conversation Mode - but it has limits
description: Conversation Mode lets you give commands to Alexa more easily, but may be slowed down by the Show 8's static design.

title: Windows 11 will now warn if you accidentally type out your password
description: Enhanced Phishing Protection feature looks to help keep Windows 11 users safe.

title: A whole host of crypto npm packages have been compromised
description: Multiple npm packages compromised to carry infostealers, researchers found.

title: A running shoe made from carbon emissions now exists – and it looks good too
description: The midsole of the running show is made using carbon monoxide emitted from steel mills and landfill sites.

title: New Silent Hill game outed by Korean ratings board
description: Silent Hill rumors have been a dime a dozen this year, but there may actually be some merit to this latest one.

title: Intuit launches QuickBooks Online Advanced
description: Intuit says latest QuickBooks iteration will help ease growing complexity and the cost-of-living crisis.

title: The Last Of Us: The apocalypse is here in the first trailer HBO's mega-budget adaptation
description: Get a first look at HBO's $155 million investment

title: Android Auto's next free update has been leaked and it's perfect for music fans
description: Android Auto's Coolwalk redesign looks ready to launch based on a new leak, but you'll need to root your phone if you want to use it today.

title: Slack and Microsoft Teams have some rather worrying security flaws
description: Researchers say there is a major risk from third-party apps on Microsoft Teams and Slack.

title: Windows 11 bug that caused havoc with Nvidia GPUs is fixed
description: Nvidia graphics card owners rejoice! The nasty bug that slowed down frame rates is cured.

title: PS5 dev kit includes a bunch of features missing from the final console
description: A YouTuber has got their hands on a PS5 dev kit, giving us an in-depth look at the machine for the first time.

title: The cost of a ‘free’ VPN: When cheap is expensive
description: Free VPNs promise to do the same as paid VPNs do, but they don't ask for anything in return. How is this possible?

title: Sophos Firewall found a serious security issue
description: Sophos warns recently discovered flaw is being exploited in the wild to run arbitrary code on vulnerable endpoints.

title: Microsoft SQL servers targeted in ransomware attacks
description: MS-SQL servers with weak protection being targeted by ransomware operators

title: Many UK firms say they don't really trust their cloud providers any more
description: Trust in public cloud providers may be dropping among IT professionals, research claims.

title: Businesses still have a long way to go to sort the biggest hybrid work problem
description: Businesses are still failing on some basic items which are costing remote workers their satisfaction.

title: Our favorite free audio editor gets some long-awaited improvements
description: Audacity 3.2 arrives with major improvements across the board.

title: Microsoft finally confirms the release date for Windows 10's major 2022 update
description: If you're still running Windows 10, you'll be getting an update that brings a bunch of fixes to your PC.

title: There's been a huge rise in open-source cyberattacks
description: As businesses turn to open-source, repositories become a great way to smuggle malicious code.

title: Intel Raptor Lake leak from Amazon suggests some pricey CPUs
description: Given the recommended pricing for Ryzen 7000 chips, this could be leaving the door open for AMD.

title: Google Photos users reporting a 'depressing' corruption issue on older images
description: Several Google Photos users have reported seeing unwanted discoloration on older image uploads.

title: Canceled: Peacock junks its second 1990s reboot in 2022
description: The third take on Queer as Folk will be a short one.

title: Businesses are feeling more confident about securing hybrid work
description: Businesses are feeling increasingly positive about their ability manage hybrid working risks, research claims.

title: The price of QD-OLED TVs could fall closer to regular OLED quicker than expected
description: OLED price drops look set to stall for the next couple of years, giving QD-OLED TVs a chance to lower costs and catch up.

title: Nintendo Switch Pro rumor looks legit, thanks to this Nvidia email
description: An Nvidia employee may have just let slip confirmation of the chip rumored to be powering the Nintendo Switch Pro.

title: Apple Pay Later could be facing some serious delays
description: Due to a series of technical and engineering setbacks, Apple Pay Later isn't expected to launch until next year.

title: Radeon RX 6000 GPUs can get a huge boost with this new software - but there’s a catch
description: The third-party utility can potentially boost an RX 6800 XT up to RTX 3090 Ti performance levels, but we would advise caution.

title: Netflix is giving away a fantastic adventure game for free
description: Netflix subscribers can pick up supernatural mystery adventure Oxenfree for free right now.

title: Pure VPN joins forces with Samsung to build a safer online world
description: Enhanced Privacy Protection (EPP) will be integrate into Samsung's secure Wi-Fi to protect users against online threats.

title: Your Chromecast with Google TV will get a big free update to Android 12
description: The Chromecast with Google TV (4K) will finally use Google's latest TV OS (Android 12_ thanks to a free update.

title: Marvel's Werewolf by Night hailed as a 'surprisingly violent' MCU monster mash
description: Critics are hailing Marvel Studios' Werewolf by Night as an "instant classic" in early social media reactions.

title: The new iPad Pro 2022 might not be worth getting excited about
description: Apple might announce the iPad Pro 2022 by press release rather than at an event, as it could just be a small upgrade.

title: A rare Google Pixel 7 leak reminds us why this phone hasn't been leaked much
description: The Google Pixel 7 hasn't leaked much compared to its Pro sibling, but a new info-dump reminds us why.

title: Amazon will kick off Black Friday early with its Prime Early Access sale
description: Amazon has announced that a Prime Early Access sale will take place in October - an exclusive Prime Day style deals event for its Prime members.
